name: trekking
description: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves. You need special shoes for hikingâ€”and a bit of a special soul as well.

name: camping
description: Money can't buy happiness, but it can buy a camper. A bad day camping is still better than a good day working.

name: sightseeing
description: The stories you can tell from such sightseeing tours can last for years or even a lifetime.

name: rappelling
description: Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.

name: paragliding
description: Life is like doing paragliding. Some will not try it and give up. While some doing it will have their head up.

name: scuba-diving
description: Either you decide to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out in the ocean.
